keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for Deutsche Bank Trust Co. Americas for the period from June 1, 2014, to June 30, 2014.
The account had a beginning balance of $93.00 and an ending balance of $50.00.
There were no significant transactions during the statement period, with only service charges noted.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries related to the account.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding electronic and non-electronic funds transfers.
